question.questionText: Explain in one sentence what each graph tells you. Graph C) size of ice cube versus time.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: As time increases, the size of the ice cube decreases.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: This tells me that the ice cube is melting.
